1317880.name: Anomaly Hunter Demo
1317880.description:
Anomaly Hunter - Hidden Object game with unique puzzle and time-traveling mechanics.
Play as STID (Space & Time Integrity Department) detective, whose role is to find & fix time anomalies, which cause a lot of trouble all over the universe.

Why do they appear, who is hiding behind all of this - simple accident or evil villain?
That's a mystery to solve.

Features
  • 15 original detailed worlds
  • Over 3 hours of fascinating gameplay
  • 1000+ unique characters and objects, each with its story to tell
  • English, Chinese, German, Spanish, Ukrainian & Russian localizations
  • Gazillion of Easter eggs, most of them you won't find anyway ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
